official_title: To direct the Administrator of General Services to lease office space in the Harlem International Trade Center located on 125th Street in the county of New York, New York.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of General Services, under specified conditions, to lease office space in the Harlem International Trade Center in New York City, New York, for use by various Federal departments and agencies.
